heading: HR01898
0: RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS THE DEADLY ATTACK ON FORMER CONGRESSMAN EUFRANIO ERIGUEL, M.D., TO EXTEND ITS DEEPEST CONDOLENCES AND SYMPATHIES TO HIS FAMILY AND TO EXPRESS SUPPORT TO HON. SANDRA YOUNG ERIGUEL, M.D., IN HER EFFORTS TO URGE THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) AND THE NATIONAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION (NBI) TO CONDUCT A SPEEDY AND IMPARTIAL INVESTIGATION IN SEEKING JUSTICE FOR THIS HEINOUS INCIDENT
